title: Episode 9: How Do You Really Raise Self-Esteem? The Incredibles vs. American Idol
description:
How do you really raise self esteem? This week we take a look at all the talk about young people, narcissism and the self esteem movement. Then we answer the question: how do you raise self esteem?

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
content:encoded: How do you really raise self esteem? This week we take a look at all the talk about young people, narcissism and the self esteem movement. Then we answer the question: how do you raise self esteem? Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
itunes:subtitle: There has been a lot of talk about young people today having a self esteem that is too high. We take a look at this issue this week on The Psych Files.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
itunes:author: Michael Britt
